scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-urban-airship && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd ../demo && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
